subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Netiquette was: Schwa/wedge merger in QS
msgSnippet: My main objection to bottom-posting is the fact that it s hard to be sure that there is no reply, when it s a long involved message and someone punched the
messageBody:
My main objection to bottom-posting is the fact that it's hard to be sure that there is no reply, when it's a long involved message and someone punched the 'send' button by mistake.
   I apologize for my last message, I usually truncate the irrelevancies from my replies to these lists, where the original message is archived.

From: Benct Philip Jonsson <bpj@...>
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, November 17, 2009 12:59:08 PM
Subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Netiquette was: Schwa/wedge merger in QS

Terry Smithwick skrev:
> Please don't bottom-post. Having to scan my way down past
> something I've already read, in order to find out if there's
> anything new, is a tedious waste of time.
